entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Ice pellets or periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
